title: 'Defending Jacob'
description:
Bill Simmons and Amanda Dobbins talk about 'Defending Jacob,' the soapy procedural drama on Apple TV featuring a woefully miscast Chris Evans.

Hosts: Bill Simmons and Amanda Dobbins 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
